column5: How do you post photos??  Thank you..........

Check out this thread....I have a post in there with diagrams on how to do it....good luck and let me know if you need any more info.  You'll have to go to www.photobucket.com and open an account and upload your pics there first.  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...c=20729&hl=
